articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-built Sunchon Catfish Farm
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Newly-built Sunchon Catfish Farm
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the newly built Sunchon Catfish Farm.
					 He looked round the mosaic depicting the benevolent image of leader Kim Jong Il erected in the compound of the farm and then was briefed on the farm before a map showing the bird's eye view of it.
					
					 The farm, with a total floor space of more than 24 120 square meters, consists of districts for production, auxiliary production, welfare and others and its production capacity is 1 200 tons per year.
					
					 In December 2015 the Supreme Leader took a step to build a catfish farm of large capacity in Sunchon area of South Phyongan Province before other provinces, and guided how to design it and personally solved all the problems arising in its construction.
					
					 The officials, builders and volunteers of the province inaugurated the farm and started its production in October last by conducting a dynamic campaign from the outset of its construction.
					
					 Noting that the farm, well built in a tidy and neat way, is in an excellent location to always ensure warm water vital to the growth conditions of catfish by using the waste water from the Sunchon Thermal Power Plant, the Supreme Leader said that South Phyongan Province took the lead in implementing the Party's policy of building modern catfish farm put on a Juche, scientific, intensive and industrial basis.
					
					 He went round room dedicated to the history of the farm, sci-tech learning space, combined production control room, hatchery, indoor fattening ground, plastic-walled pools, feed processing plant, material storage, freezing storage and other parts of the farm to learn in detail about its construction and production.
					
					 He gave instructions on the management and operation of the farm, stressing the need for it to set an ambitious goal and put the production on a normal track.
					
					 The farm, which came to being amid the struggle to implement the decision of the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a precious creation of the officials, party members and other working people of South Phyongan Province who turned out with optimism about the future and reliance on their own efforts, he said. He added that his confidence grows stronger upon hearing that the people of the province came to keenly feel again, through the construction of the farm, that they can do anything and can be better off when they give play to the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats performed by the officials, builders and volunteers for building the perfect farm as intended by the Party, saying he was very satisfied with the farm completed to be impeccable even in the distant future.
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that the officials and employees of the farm would surely turn out 1 200 tons of catfish every year for the people of the province under the banner of scientific fish farming, and had a photo session with them.
					
					 Accompanying him were O Su Yong and Pak Thae Song, vice-chairmen of the C.C., WPK, and Jo Yong Won, vice department director of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: Statement by Director of Press of Institution for American Studies of DPRK Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Statement by Director of Press of Institution for American Studies of DPRK Foreign Ministry
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Jo Chol Su, director of Press of the Institution for American Studies of the DPRK Foreign Ministry, issued the following statement on Tuesday:
					 Recently, some policy research institutions and media of the U.S. and other Western countries publicized the so called "merciless nuclear attack plan" of the DPRK and claimed that the DPRK is planning random and indiscriminate attacks on the U.S. and Asian countries drawing no distinction between military and civilian targets.
					
					 On the other hand, they are prompting the baseless speculation that the DPRK seeks a nuclear attack on south Korea during the Pyongchang Winter Olympic Games and that the DPRK might go for another "ultra high level provocation" by conducting a ballistic missile test launch on the occasion of Christmas.
					
					 They claim that these projections are based on their study and analysis of the reports by the DPRK's media, however these are nothing but slanders to "demonize" the DPRK by twisting the meaning of our tough stand and absurd paradox worked out by the laymen who lack elementary understanding of the purpose of the DPRK's nuclear deterrence.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S. that is hatching plots to launch preemptive nuclear strike on sovereign countries after adding them to the list of targets for its nuclear preemptive strike, and the American politicians are the very ones who call for the military option and preemptive strikes against sovereign states time and again without the slightest hesitation.
					
					 The U.S. deployed massive amount of its nuclear assets into the Korean peninsula and ceaselessly carries out joint military exercises under various names. Current situation evidently shows that it is only a matter of time that a nuclear war breaks out on the peninsula due to Trump's war mania and that the choice made by the DPRK was absolutely right.
					
					 The attempts to defame the dignified image of the DPRK by spreading baseless allegations against it are further increasing our vigilance as they are happening at the time when Trump designated the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism" after vowing to "totally destroy" it and the moves of the Trump administration to stifle the DPRK are reaching the extremes.
					
					 To make it clear once again, the DPRK's nuclear force which targets none other than the U.S. is the reliable deterrent to prevent a nuclear war and firmly defend peace on the Korean peninsula by thoroughly eradicating the half-a-century long unilateral nuclear blackmail and threat from the U.S.
					
					 We take this opportunity to issue a warning to the pseudo-intellectuals who are hurling vicious abuse at the DPRK in pursuance of the moves of the Trump administration and some of the Western media that are producing false reports based on absurd and groundless speculations.
					
					 If you are truly interested in the settlement of the nuclear issue and peace and security, you should properly understand the root cause of the nuclear issue based on your own principles and contribute to international justice by being true to the principle of objectivity and unbiasedness, the very life and mission of the media.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Mauritanian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Mauritanian President
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Presidium member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Mohamed Ould Abdelaziz, president of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania, on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of its independence. 
					 Kim Yong Nam in the message wished the Mauritanian president and people greater success in the work for development and prosperity of the country, hoping that the relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: DPRK Will Fulfill Its Mission for Int'l Justice: Head of DPRK Delegation to Asian Parliamentary Assembly
articles.content:
DPRK Will Fulfill Its Mission for Int'l Justice: Head of DPRK Delegation to Asian Parliamentary Assembly
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Tenth Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly took place in Turkey from Nov. 21 to 23.
					 Ri Jong Hyok, deputy to the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and director of the National Reunification Institute who led the SPA delegation, made a speech at the plenary session held under the theme; achieving peace and development of Asia.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The nations in Asia, who had removed the century-long legacies of colonial domination caused by the western powers and are dynamically advancing towards peaceful and prosperous Asia.
					
					 However, due to the unchanging ambition of the powers for domination of the Asian continent and their aggressive interference in the region, the peace and development are still facing grave challenges in our region, including the Northeast Asia and the Middle East. 
					
					 In particular, the tension on the Korean Peninsula is aggravated day after day since the emergence of the Trump administration causing serious concern over the world.
					
					 While the U.S. threat of nuclear war against the DPRK is perilous, which was hardly seen even during the Cold War period, the sanctions against the DPRK are also extremely reckless and barbarous one.
					
					 The U.S. is attempting to obscure the real purpose of the sanctions by arguing that it is a "peaceful solution". However, it can never cover up the inhumane and criminal features of the sanctions to isolate and stifle our State and nation by primitive means, who never gave in to nuclear threats.
					
					 History shows that if our country, the east gate to the Asian continent, is weak, the Korean peninsula would become the competing ground of the powers and whole of Asia would be involved in the vortex of war.
					
					 Our army and people, holding in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, will resolutely smash the reckless nuclear war provocation and the sinister moves of sanctions and pressure of the Unites States by further increasing our own strength under the banner of independence and self-reliance. And we will also fulfill our mission in the struggle to safeguard the peace in the Korean Peninsula and Asia and realize international justice.
					
					 I am convinced that the theme of this plenary; achieving peace and development of Asia, will surely become a reality when all Asian peoples are united under the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 In conclusion, I would like to express unreserved support to and solidarity with the peoples in Asian countries including Iran, Syria and Palestine who are struggling to put an end to the interference of foreign forces and to defend the sovereignty of the nation.

articles.title: SPA Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
SPA Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly led by Deputy Ri Jong Hyok, director of the National Reunification Institute, arrived here Tuesday after taking part in the 10th Plenary Session of the Asian Parliamentary Assembly held in Turkey.

articles.title: Symposium on Space Science and Technology Opens in DPRK
articles.content:
Symposium on Space Science and Technology Opens in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The symposium on space science and technology-2017 opened with due ceremony at the Sci-Tech Complex here Tuesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea (GFSTK).
					 Taking part in it are various units including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the State Academy of Sciences, the Academy of Social Sciences, the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications and the Ministry of Land and Environment Protection.
					
					 Introduced there will be more than 280 valuable papers dealing with the significance and importance of peaceful space development and the achievements and application experience gained in space conquest such as manufacture of artificial earth satellites and control technology.
					
					 The symposium, divided into artificial earth satellite, space materials and elements, basic science, application and social science panels, will include lectures on "space environment", "space materials" and "space conquest".
					
					 Present at its opening ceremony were officials of the GFSTK Central Committee of the General Federation, officials concerned, scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers and postgraduate students.
					
					 Ri Won Chol, chairman of the Korea Space Association, made an opening speech.
					
					 The symposium will last until Dec. 1.

articles.title: DPRK Players Back Home from Asian Marathon Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Players Back Home from Asian Marathon Championship
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Marathoners of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea came back home Tuesday after taking part in the 16th Asian Marathon Championship.
					 Marathoners and coaches visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill to pay floral tribute to them.

articles.title: Fruit Yield Increased in DPRK
articles.content:
Fruit Yield Increased in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK reaped tens of thousands more tons of fruit this year than last year.
					 Kwail County in South Hwanghae Province dug a large amount of peat for the production of quality huminite, created a 24 km-long windbreak along coastline and developed agrochemicals with its own efforts, thus increasing per-hectare fruit yield 2.5 times, apple production 5.8 times in particular.
					
					 The Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm produced thousands more tons of apple by fertilizing and tending orchards in a scientific way and introducing advanced technology, while the Kosan Combined Fruit Farm harvested 1.5 times more fruit this year than last year.
					
					 The same is true of the Toksong Apple Farm and Onchon, Songhan, Sariwon, Myonggan and Ryulsong fruit farms which have ensured the full operation of farm machines and introduced efficient sprayer into fruit farming.

articles.title: New Hydraulic Drill Developed
articles.content:
New Hydraulic Drill Developed
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Unsan Exploratory Machine Factory under the Ministry of National Natural Resources Development in the DPRK developed a new hydraulic drill.
					 In this regard, Ri Tong Gyu, staff of the technological development department of the factory, told KCNA:
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un sent a historic letter "Let Us Bring about a New Upsurge in Geological Prospecting" to the participants in the National Meeting of Workers Active in Geological Prospecting held last year.
					
					 In order to implement the tasks set forth by Kim Jong Un in his letter, a designing institute of the ministry and a technology group of the factory completed the design of the hydraulic drill, the main parts of which can be produced with locally available materials, on the basis of technical indices confirmed in reality.
					
					 The weight of new drill is a ton lighter than the existing one, but 1.8 times higher in rotational frequency.
					
					 It is smooth to control its rotational speed and easy to install and operate the drill.
					
					 Meanwhile, the factory succeeded in manufacturing artificial diamond crowns of different sizes.

articles.title: DPRK Will Not Just Remain Onlooker to Japan's Hostile Acts: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Will Not Just Remain Onlooker to Japan's Hostile Acts: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean peninsula escalating due to the U.S. is increasing the danger of a war in Northeast Asia.
					 It is against this backdrop that Japan has further strained the situation while coming out as a shock brigade in executing the U.S. moves for putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK as if it had waited for the opportunity to come.
					
					 Prime Minister Abe and key figures of the political camp are keen on inciting the atmosphere of a war inside Japan while going around with blood-shot eyes to elicit the international support for sanctions and pressure on the DPRK while claiming that now is the "time to put more pressure on the north".
					
					 On Nov. 17 Abe said that "threat from north Korea" is the most serious security issue Japan has faced after the Second World War and it is necessary to further increase the measure to defend Japan to cope with this. Foreign Minister Kono on Nov. 24 said that "north Korea's nuclear test and its missiles that fly over Japan constitute unprecedented threats not only to Japan but the international community as a whole. This can never be tolerated".
					
					 What is the strategic purpose sought by Japan which is so much concerned about the situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Japan has persistently tried to prove the conditions of "emergency" around Japan by taking the advantage of the situation on the Korean peninsula while trying to use it as a pretext for the increase in the defence budget and military capabilities.
					
					 The Abe government has created the atmosphere favorable for defusing internal political crisis and realizing the constitutional revision by citing "nuclear and missile threats from north Korea" as a pretext.
					
					 Abe, in particular, seeks to arouse social concerns and make society veer to the right through the collusion with right-wing forces in a bid to remain in power for long.
					
					 What he seeks here is to build up the public opinion inside Japan by spreading the "story of crisis on the Korean peninsula".
					
					 During the recent election of the members of the House of Representatives Abe and the Liberal Democratic Party went around, loudly claiming that "nuclear and missile provocation by north Korea is a great threat to Japan" and asking for "encouraging the Liberal Democratic Party so that it can resolutely counter the threat from north Korea". This is just a typical example.
					
					 Japan keen on meeting its own interests by finding fault with others is trying to incite hostility toward the DPRK to the maximum, embroil the whole Japanese archipelago into the militarist whirlwind and thus realize the constitutional revision for becoming a military giant.
					
					 It is quite natural that the international community and even the Japanese are describing the Abe ruling forces' moves as the ones aimed at the "revival of militarism under the pretext of threat from north Korea", "creation of pretexts for justifying preemptive attack on the north" and a "political trick to turn the table in its favor".
					
					 The Abe group is going reckless in its moves to impose sanctions and pressure on the DPRK while loudly trumpeting about "nuclear and missile threats from the north". This is an intolerable act of hostility toward the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people will not just remain an on-looker to the vicious moves of the Japanese reactionaries who are spurring their moves for reinvasion with the backing of the U.S. only to add crimes to those already committed by them.

articles.title: U.S. Arms Buildup under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Arms Buildup under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Trump administration increased defense budget 10 percent in March and decided to put 700 billion U.S. dollars to defense budget for next year, 3.1 percent more than that of this year. In particular, it branded the nuclear deterrence of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for self-defence as the "biggest threat to security" and, under the pretence to cope with it, greatly increased budget of the Missile Defense Agency under the U.S. Defense Department to 12.3 billion U.S. dollars. It also decided to additionally deploy 28 GBI interceptor missiles in Alaska deploy strategic bombers capable of carrying nuclear bombs around the Korean Peninsula and spend more budget for missile intercepting system aiming at the DPRK and for boosting military power in the Asia-Pacific region.
					 This clearly proves once again the brutal and aggressive nature of the U.S. imperialists to threaten anti-U.S. independent countries and potential rivals by force and dominate the world, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a commentary. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the U.S. is running amuck to realize the strategy for aggression of the Korean Peninsula and world supremacy by spending huge budget under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threat" from the DPRK.
					
					 History showed that the U.S. increase of military spending has escalated arms race among big powers and disturbed global peace and security and increased the danger of a nuclear war in the Korean peninsula and the region, in particular.
					
					 The U.S. being frantic with the worst-ever economic sanctions and military threats to stifle the DPRK is greatly increasing military spending. This is a prelude to a nuclear war against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK will not remain an onlooker to the reckless moves of the U.S. imperialist warmongers increasing the danger of a nuclear war while augmenting military spending but decisively counter the moves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Regime's Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Japanese Regime's Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- At international meetings held abroad recently Abe asked leaders of foreign countries to "cooperate in pressurizing" the DPRK. He asserted that the international community should exert "strong pressure" on the DPRK to "force it to change its policy."  He begged the neighboring countries to "play a constructive role" to "check nuclear and missile development of the DPRK" and instructed the south Korean puppet regime to "escalate sanctions and pressure" on it like his regime.
					 Against this backdrop, the Abe regime is inciting hostility toward the DPRK and war atmosphere throughout Japan, talking about "threat" and "the most serious security crisis."
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a commentary terms this an unpardonable act hostile to the DPRK.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 The Abe regime's crazy confrontation racket against the DPRK under the pretext of "threat" is becoming a serious threat not only to Japan but also to the international community.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are escalating tensions on the Korean peninsula and in the region as a shock brigade of the U.S. for carrying out its hostile policy toward the DPRK and its strategy for dominating the Asia-Pacific region. They are just the sworn enemy of the Korean people and other peoples in Asia and cancer-like ones disturbing global peace.
					
					 Far from making an apology and reparations for the past crimes, the reactionaries of Japan are adding to the crimes, unhesitatingly revealing their wild ambition for reinvasion. The service personnel and people of the DPRK are hardly repressing their towering indignation and hatred toward the reactionaries of the island nation.
					
					 We will never remain passive toward the foolhardy moves of the reactionaries but surely force them to pay dearly for their hideous provocation against the DPRK.
					
					 The Abe group should not gamble on the fate of the island nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Slashes at U.S. Moves for Making Asian-version NATO
articles.content:
Minju Joson Slashes at U.S. Moves for Making Asian-version NATO
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. started a joint military drill in the waters off Okinawa of Japan on Nov. 16 with the involvement of Japan "Self-Defense Forces", 14 000 troops, USS Ronald Reagan and three guided missile destroyers. Timed to coincide with it, the U.S. rounded off the deployment of its 16 F-35Bs boasting of their VTOL and high stealth capabilities and high-efficiency radar in Japan.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 The above-said moves prove that the U.S. is getting frantic in its moves to secure military edge in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 CNN, the New York Times and other major U.S. media recently held that the core of Trump's new Asia policy is to make Asian-version NATO with its Asian allies as a pivot.
					
					 Those concerned of the U.S. military involved in joint military drills with various codenames are openly asserting that the drills are aimed to promote the capabilities for military cooperation and "inter-operability."
					
					 The U.S. crazy moves for establishing the Asian-version NATO are aimed to tighten its control over its inferior allies under the military alliance system and carry out its policy of aggression and confrontation in Asia.
					
					 The U.S. is hell-bent on the moves to maintain and cement its military edge in the region by dint of its absolute force but it is just a pipedream.
					
					 War and confrontation will only bring complete ruin to it, not benefits.
					
					 The U.S. should stop at once such risky moves of doing harm to others as they will only backfire.

articles.title: Punishment of "Liberal Korea Party" Coteries Called for
articles.content:
Punishment of "Liberal Korea Party" Coteries Called for 
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The recent investigation for abolition of evils conducted by the puppet prosecution of south Korea has been directed to the "Liberal Korea Party", drawing attention of the public opinion.
					 Commenting on this, a commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday says:
					
					 What matters is that the coteries of the LKP are rebuffing it, while getting vocal about "political retaliation" and "crisis of disbandment of the party", being upset by the investigation getting intensified.
					
					 This is an impudent and shameless act reminding one of a thief crying "Stop Thief!"
					
					 By nature, the group of the LKP is made up of top class criminals who resorted to all sorts of illegal and lawless acts while serving traitors Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the south Korean public has long vehemently denounced and rejected not only the LKP but also its predecessors the "Grand National Party" and the "Saenuri Party" as "thief parties", "parties of embezzlement" and "parties of corruption".
					
					 Moreover, the group of the LKP led by Hong Jun Phyo is forcing those who have become targets of investigation to withdraw from the party of their own accords, while trying to give impression that they have nothing to do with the pro-Park Geun Hye elements. This is the height of ridiculousness.
					
					 No matter what a sleight of hand the LKP group may resort to cover up their dirty body with the veil of "clean conservatism", they can never conceal their sordid nature as the group of thieves and top class criminals.
					
					 It is the demand of the mindset of south Korean people that all the crimes committed by the LKP have to be probed to the last and top class criminals have to be severely punished.

articles.title: LKP Representative's Challenge to Abolition of Conservative Evils Denounced
articles.content:
LKP Representative's Challenge to Abolition of Conservative Evils Denounced
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Representative of the "Liberal Korea Party" of south Korea Hong Jun Phyo is viciously challenging the struggle to abolish the evil administration of the conservatives, says a commentary of Minju Joson Tuesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 After their visit to the U.S. at the end of October, traitor Hong Jun Phyo and his group have stood against the struggle for ending evil administration, claiming that it is like a "public trial" and a "wild sword dance for political retaliation". He is describing his party as the "only political party of conservatism", while calling for displaying photos of Syngman Rhee, Park Chung-Hee and Kim Young Sam inside the party building. He is making desperate efforts to end the abolition of the pro-Park Geun Hye elements along with the expulsion of Park Geun Hye from the party under the pretext of "reconstruction of conservatism".
					
					 The frantic moves of Hong to revive the right-wing conservative forces under the backstage manipulation of the U.S. have touched off great indignation of the broad range of the south Koreans.
					
					 Traitor Hong claimed that his visit to the U.S. was because of "nuclear threat from the north" but, in fact, it was pursuant to a stop-gap measure taken by his master to summon the head of the conservatives and give shot in the arms of the group of traitors in their efforts for revival as he felt uneasiness in face of the shaking colonial ruling foundation.
					
					 The thoughtless protest of the conservatives including Hong against the struggle for the abolition of evils with the backing of the U.S. is as foolish an act as trying to reverse the wheel of history.
					
					 It is the will of the south Koreans which is getting stronger to clear south Korea of all the evils left by conservatism.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism Disclosed
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Revive Militarism Disclosed
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Asia Economy on Nov. 24 disclosed the fact that the Japanese government together with Britain pushed ahead with new air-to-air missile development, attempting to revive militarism.
					 Japan is going to adopt a joint action program for missile development at the ministerial talks to be held in Britain in December, the paper said, adding:
					
					 Japan's bid to expand joint drills with the forces of Britain is to restrain the DPRK and China by introducing Britain.
					
					 Moreover, the Abe government is working to take note of existence of the "Self-Defense Forces" in Article 9 of the constitution.
					
					 Japan's import of military equipment has increased every year and this year's budget for it increased 2.6 times than five years ago.

articles.title: Special Pardon for Prisoners of Conscience Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Special Pardon for Prisoners of Conscience Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The youth promotion committee for release of prisoners of conscience held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 26, in demand of special pardon for prisoners of conscience, according to Voice of People, a south Korean internet newspaper.
					 The speakers said that the special pardon should be given to former lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party Ri Sok Gi, Chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Han Sang Gyun and all other prisoners of conscience who were subject to harsh suppression under the previous regime.
					
					 The release of the prisoners of conscience is the genuine start for the abolition of evils, they said, urging the authorities to take a decision for the building of new society.
					
					 They stressed that they would fight it out to restore democracy and defend human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Organize "Decapitation Unit"
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan to Organize "Decapitation Unit"
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The puppet warmongers of south Korea are mulling finishing the reorganization of some units belonging to the special warfare command into a special task brigade for "decapitation operation" by Dec. 1, according to News 1 of south Korea.
					 This brigade, called "decapitation unit", is to perform "decapitation operation" targeting the headquarters and major military installments in the DPRK after intruding into Pyongyang in case of emergency.
					
					 The puppet military already asserted that the unit is "aimed at the war headquarters of the north".
					
					 It has already worked out appropriate budget to arm the unit with special transport helicopters and special weapons after its reorganization into the special task brigade.
					
					 With the imminent ruin of Park early this year, the puppet military rescheduled to finish the reorganization within this year, though it was originally planned to be finished by 2019.
					
					 This was strongly denounced and rebuffed by the public at home and abroad but the puppet warmongers have pressed for the organization of the "decapitation unit" by taking advantage of the U.S. imperialists' execution of their policy for aggression on the DPRK.

articles.title: Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery Demanded in Japan
articles.content:
Settlement of Issue of Sexual Slavery Demanded in Japan
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A large-scale candlelight rally demanding the settlement of the sexual slavery issue was held at downtown Tokyo of Japan on Nov. 25.
					 A great number of people took part in the rally sponsored by the national action for the settlement of the issue of comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army, which consists of more than 50 civic organizations.
					
					 The participants in the rally urged the need for the Abe government to have proper understanding of the issue of sexual slavery, stressing that only genuine settlement of the issue would become a starting point for settling the issue of violence against women in the Japanese society.
					
					 There are serious sexual molesting and violence against women in Japan, they said, adding that Japan is going backward in terms of human rights.
					
					 They also quoted the Osaka mayor as saying that he would cut off relations with San Francisco over the San Francisco city government's approval for the erection of a statue of sexual slave, noting this clearly proves Japan's level of understanding of human rights.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A Romanian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 17.
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from Nov. 17 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Is Always Alive in Hearts of Korean People: Congolese Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Is Always Alive in Hearts of Korean People: Congolese Organization
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people.
					 The Congolese committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il said this in a special bulletin released on Nov. 15 with the approach of the sixth anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The bulletin noted:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea and Songun idea founded by President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, and thus made the Korean people steadily advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism.
					
					 It was the greatest exploit performed by Kim Jong Il that he firmly defended Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The bulletin said that he put the DPRK on the position of the political, ideological and military power, provided a firm foundation for building an economic power and devoted himself to the country and people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The Korean people's cause of building a powerful socialist nation is the sacred cause of realizing his lifetime plan and desire, it added.

articles.title: U.S. Should Not Underestimate DPRK's Might: Nepali Organization
articles.content:
U.S. Should Not Underestimate DPRK's Might: Nepali Organization
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- The Nepali Literary Forum for the Study of Songun Politics issued a statement titled "The U.S. should not underestimate the DPRK's might" on Nov. 16.
					 The statement branded Trump's junket to Asia as a confrontational one for starting a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula as he openly revealed his true colors as the destroyer of global peace and security.
					
					 The U.S. should draw a due lesson from its bitter defeat in the Korean War in the 1950s and incidents of its armed spy ship Pueblo and large-sized spy plane EC-121.
					
					 The history of confrontation between the DPRK and the U.S. goes to clearly prove that the latter should not underestimate the former.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is the very just and inevitable option for self-defense to defend the country's sovereignty and dignity and people's right to existence and development from the U.S. escalating nuclear threat, blackmail and hostile moves.
					
					 Gone are the days never to return when the U.S could pose threats to the DPRK with nukes.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing despite the imperialists' harsh sanctions and pressure.
					
					 Thanks to the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and single-minded unity and inexhaustible military power, the Korean people are sure to win the final victory in the showdown with the U.S. imperialists.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, November 28 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed on Nov. 19.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events to praise the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il on the sixth anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre la Fabrica de Siluros de Sunchon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre la Fabrica de Siluros de Sunchon
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Siluros de Sunchon, nuevamente construida.
					Tras ver el mural de mosaico con imagen generosa del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, construido en el recinto de la fabrica, escucho las explicaciones ante el mapa de vista a vuelo de pajaro de la fabrica.
					
					La fabrica con el area arquitectonica total de mas de 24 mil 120 metros cuadrados esta dividida en las regiones de produccion principal, la suplementaria y el servicio publico y tiene capacidad de produccion anual de mil 200 toneladas.
					
					En diciembre de 2015, el Maximo Dirigente tomo la medida de construir una fabrica de siluros de gran capacidad en la region de Sunchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur antes que otras provincias, dirigio el plan de diseno y dio soluciones a todos los problemas por la obra.
					
					Al realizar un intenso trabajo desde el inicio de la construccion, los funcionarios, constructores y voluntarios de la provincia lograron en octubre los exitos de inaugurar la fabrica y comenzar la produccion.
					
					Han construido bien la piscifactoria elegante y ordenada, alabo el Maximo Dirigente y apunto que han levantado la fabrica en un sitio excelente donde se permite satisfacer las condiciones de cria de siluros utilizando el agua caliente proveniente de la Central Termoelectrica de Sunchon. Evaluo que la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur se puso a la cabeza del trabajo de materializar excelentemente la orientacion del partido de construir las modernas fabricas de siluros cuyos procesos esten jucheanizados, cientifizados, sintetizados e industrializados.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente recorrio varios lugares de la fabrica entre otros la sala de presentacion del historial, la de divulgacion de ciencias y tecnicas, la de mando general, el edificio de incubacion, el de engorde bajo techo, las piscinas de pelicula al aire libre, el campo de procesamiento de pienso, el almacen de materias primas, el refrigerador y el taller de elaboracion de siluros, mientras que se cercioro en detalles del estado de construccion y de produccion.
					
					Senalo que la fabrica debe acelerar mas los trabajos para normalizar la produccion bajo la meta muy ambiciosa y dio las instrucciones valiosas para la administracion de la fabrica.
					
					La Fabrica de Siluros de Sunchon deviene una fabrica nacida en medio de la campana para la materializacion de la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y constituye una creacion preciosa lograda por los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur quienes se levantaron confiandose en sus propias fuerzas y en el futuro radiante. Y agrego que le da gran animo el hecho de que a traves de la construccion de la fabrica los habitantes de la provincia volvieron a sentirse profundamente que pueden hacer lo todo y vivir mas felices si se apoyan en el espiritu revolucionario de antoconfianza.
					
					Subrayo que ha recorrido con satisfaccion la fabrica, construida tan perfectamente no solo para hoy, sino tambien para el futuro lejano, y aprecio altamente los meritos de los funcionarios, constructores y voluntarios de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur que contribuyeron activamente a edificar con excelencia la fabrica conforme al proposito del partido.
					
					Expuso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y empleados de la fabrica produciran incondicionalmente un mil 200 toneladas de siluros al ano bajo la bandera de piscicultura basada en las ciencias y los suministraran a los habitantes de la provincia, y se fotografio junto a ellos.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente fue acompanado por los vicepresidentes del Comite Central del PTC, O Su Yong y Pak Thae Song, y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: El Instituto de EE.UU. condena organismos de investigacion de politicas y medios de prensa de EE.UU. y del Occidente
articles.content:
El Instituto de EE.UU. condena organismos de investigacion de politicas y medios de prensa de EE.UU. y del Occidente
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Jo Chol Su , jefe de la seccion de informacion del Instituto de Estados Unidos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 28 la declaracion siguiente:
					En los ultimos dias, unos organismos de investigacion de politicas y medios de prensa de EE.UU. y los paises occidentales publicaron un supuesto "plan del despiadado ataque nuclear" de la RPDC difundiendo las absurdas insistencias en que nuestro pais trata de "dar un despiadado ataque nuclear" a los objetos civiles y militares de EE.UU. y los paises asiaticos.
					
					Tambien, divulgan las vanas suposiciones de que la RPDC "planea un ataque nuclear" contra el Sur de Corea en el periodo de los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales de Pyongchang y puede hacer una "provocacion de tamano especial" mediante el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico con motivo de Navidad.
					
					Tales insistencias, que segun esos organos y medios de prensa estan basadas en los analisis sobre los datos informativos de nuestros medios de prensa, devienen la difamacion para "satanizar" a nuestro Estado tergiversando nuestras posiciones intransigentes ya aclaradas y no pasan de ser las absurdas mentiras inventadas por los tipejos que no tienen ni la comprension elemental sobre la mision del disuasorio nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. es precisamente el pais que pone abiertamente a los Estados soberanos en la lista de ataque nuclear preventivo y trama las artimanas para acatarlos con las armas. Tambien, los politiqueros norteamericanos son precisamente quienes pronuncian sin ninguna vacilacion las insistencias de ataque preventivo contra los Estados soberanos hablando ruidosamente del proyecto de opcion militar.
					
					La realidad actual de la Peninsula Coreana donde se emplazan en gran medida los equipos de guerra nuclear y se desarrollan incesantemente los diferentes ejercicios militares conjuntos comprueba que el estallido de la guerra nuclear debido a la locura belicista de Trump es la cuestion de tiempo y que son mil veces justas nuestra decision y opcion de tomar el remedio nuclear de justicia.
					
					Nos hacen elevar mas la vigilancia tales intenciones de manchar la imagen de nuestro sagrado Estado divulgando las insistencias falsas cuando pasan el limite las maniobras de aplastamiento anti-RPDC de la administracion de Trump, que reclamo abiertamente el exterminio de nuestro Estado e incluyo a esto en la lista de los "paises patrocinadores del terrorismo" que no tiene ningun vinculo con nosotros.
					
					Volvemos a aclarar que las fuerzas armadas nucleares de nuestro Estado que tienen como su blanco a EE.UU. devienen el fidedigno disuasivo para poner fin al chantaje y amenaza nucleares unilaterales de EE.UU., que duran mas de medio siglo, y asi prevenir el estallido de guerra nuclear y defender con seguridad la paz en este territorio.
					
					En esta oportunidad, advertimos a los seudosabios, que denigran desesperadamente a nuestro pais poniendose al lado de la administracion de Trump, y a unos medios de prensa occidentales que repiten como papagayo las opiniones falsas.
					
					Si ellos tienen de veras un interes en la resolucion del problema nuclear y el aseguramiento de la paz y la estabilidad, deberan ver correctamente y con sus propios juicios el origen del problema nuclear y contribuir a la realizacion de la justicia internacional quedandose fiel a la mision de la prensa que tiene la imparcialidad como su vida.

articles.title: Inaugurado seminario sobre ciencias y tecnicas espaciales-2017
articles.content:
Inaugurado seminario sobre ciencias y tecnicas espaciales-2017
Pyongyang, 28 de noviembre (ACNC) -- Quedo inaugurado el seminario sobre las ciencias y tecnicas espaciales-2017 bajo auspicios del Comite Central de la Federacion General de Ciencia y Tecnica de Corea. 
					Alli participaron la Universidad Kim Il Sung, la Universidad Tecnica Kim Chaek, la Academia Estatal de Ciencias, la Academia de Ciencias Sociales, el Ministerio de Comunicaciones, el Ministerio de Proteccion Territorial y Ambiental y otras unidades.
					
					En la ocasion se daran a conocer mas de 280 disertaciones, entre ellas, la significacion y la importancia del desarrollo espacial con fines pacificos, los exitos logrados en la exploracion del cosmos incluyendo la fabricacion y las tecnologias de control de los satelites artificiales y las experiencias de su aplicacion.
					
					En el seminario se realizara dividido en las secciones de la luna artificial, los materiales y elementos espaciales, la ciencia basica, la aplicacion y las ciencias sociales y se impartiran las lecciones con los temas "Sobre el ambiente cosmico", "Sobre los materiales espaciales", la "Exploracion del cosmos", etc. y la proyeccion de un video.
					
					   La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar el dia 28 en el Palacio de Ciencias y Tecnicas.
					
					El seminario terminara el dia primero de diciembre.
